ClassDesc: This class allows a customized widget class to implement @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#TitleViewAdapter#Provider_E@ and expose @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#TitleViewAdapter_E@ methods to containing fragment (e.g. BrowseFragment or DetailsFragment). The title view must have a search orb view (@B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#TitleViewAdapter#getSearchAffordanceView_E@ aligned to start and can typically have a branding Drawable and or title text aligned to end. The branding part is fully open to customization: not necessary to be a drawable or text.
